attributes.action: Remove Means Testing For Care Homes For The Elderly
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In many cases elderly people are being forced to use their life savings to cover care home charges.   I believe means testing should either be abolished or the threshold increased to a much more considerate level.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
